data.name: Warstride Challenges
data.detailed_description:
LIVING ROADMAP


About the Game

Race, aim, fire!

Blast hordes of demons at lightning speed in bloody gunfights across a series of increasingly intense trials. Slow time to pull off impossible headshots, bunny hop to pick up speed, slide around corners and shred foes with destructive shockwaves! Die and retry to pull off the perfect run, then prove your worth on theglobal leaderboard to let the world know you’re the greatest demon slayer.

Race against the clock to overcome every challenge that comes your way, unlocking and unleashing an arsenal of devastating weapons and powers. Compete with your friends and the community to get the highest score and race the ghosts of anyone online – even your favorite streamers! Whether you’re an eSports pro or a shooter beginner, you’ll progress to become an FPS master.

  • Get in the flow: blast hordes of demons in satisfying, bloody combat
  • Die and retry to get the highest score: show the world you’re the greatest demon slayer!
  • Challenge anyone online, racing them async with the Nemesis Mode
  • Create, share and play unique challenges from the community

data.short_description: Blast hordes of demons at lightning speed in bloody gunfights, and race against the clock to overcome everything that comes your way! Die and retry to get the highest score in increasingly intense trials. Create and share your own runs, enjoying hundreds of levels created by the community.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“Has the potential to take the hardcore FPS community by storm”
Techraptor

“A damn fun game”
PC Invasion

“A gauntlet you want to invest in”
Rock Paper Shotgun

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: AMD FX-6300 / Intel Core i5-2500K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM, AMD Radeon RX 460 / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS in 1920x1080 (Low Graphic Preset)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3350GE / Intel Core i7-7700K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB VRAM, AMD Radeon RX 480 / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS in 1920x1080 (Epic Graphic Preset)
